dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5160 IH: Stem Cell Therapeutic and Research Reauthorization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Smith of New Jersey (for himself, Ms. Matsui, Mr. Bilirakis, Ms. Pingree, Ms. Tenney, and Mr. Mfume) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Stem Cell Therapeutic and Research Act of 2005, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stem Cell Therapeutic and Research Reauthorization Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of the C.W. Bill Young Cell Transplantation Program
section.text: Section 379B of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 274m) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking appropriated $31,009,000 and inserting the following:
in paragraph (1), as so inserted, by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
$33,009,000 for each of fiscal years 2027 through 2031.

section.text: Section 2(g) of the Stem Cell Therapeutic and Research Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 274k note) is amended by striking 2026 and inserting 2031.
